English: History of the Later Tang Dynasty, seventeenth of the 24 dynastic histories `二十四史~[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Ouyang Xiu `歐陽修~|欧阳`修~[Ou1 yang2 Xiu1] and Song Qi `宋祁~[Song4 Qi2] in 1060 during Northern Song `北宋~[Bei3 Song4], 225 scrolls

d.f: `書~`名~。`宋朝~`歐陽修~、`宋祁~`等~`奉~`敕~`編撰~。`二百二~`十~`五~`卷~。`記~`唐朝~`建國~`到~`滅亡~`的~`史實~，`與~《`舊唐書~》`並行~`於~`世~，`同~`為~`中國~`紀傳體~`史書~`二十四史~`之~`一~。

English: History of the Later Tang Dynasty, seventeenth of the 24 dynastic histories `二十四史~[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Ouyang Xiu `歐陽修~|欧阳`修~[Ou1 yang2 Xiu1] and Song Qi `宋祁~[Song4 Qi2] in 1060 during Northern Song `北宋~[Bei3 Song4], 225 scrolls
